titleStmt.title: The whole booke of Iob paraphrased or, made easie for any to understand. By George Abbott.
titleStmt.author: Abbot, George, 1604-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edward Griffin for Henry Overton, and are to be sold at his shop at the entrance into Popes-head-alley, out of Lumbard-street,

notesStmt.note: With the original Bible text in English.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop at the entrance into Popes-head-alley, out of Lumbard-street
